about_the_game:
2 Level DEMO Features



This demo features the first 2 levels of the full game and is playable either single player or with a friend via local co-op.

3 x Demo specific online leader boards for High Scores are included in this demo version and the game will advise your current rank as you play through the levels,

All powerup collectables are available on the demo and nothing has been stripped or changed from the first 2 levels of the full game.

There are also 3 unlockable difficulty modes if you are ready for the challenge.

Demo supports Keyboard and Mouse but is best played with a dual analogue controller (with rumble motors for hit detection feedback)

If you like the DEMO then please help me by wish listing the full game on the store page.
It is a small gesture of support that would really mean a lot to me!

Thanks
Paul

name: Eagles of World War 2 Demo
short_description: A 2 level demo of the full game featuring demo exclusive high score tables and 3 unlockable (5 total) difficulty modes. This demo can also be played with a friend via local co-op and if best enjoyed with a controller (rumble motors recommended),
